name: Eternal Fate
blurb: A competitive PvP-focused action RPG for your PC or Mac

rewards.reward: Digital download of the finished game from our site or from one of our distribution partners + a set of in-game weapons exclusive to Kickstarter backers.  Also, priority access to the game's upcoming closed beta!
An exclusive in-game Kickstarter Shield + guaranteed access to the game's upcoming closed beta.  Includes all previous reward tiers.
Early Bird Offer! This tier gives you everything in the $60 tier at a reduced price! Early Bird backers will be credited in the game as "Early Supporters."

PDF version of the Art of Eternal Fate (filled with full color pages of concept art, original photos, development secrets, developer bios and more!) + a digital download of the game's soundtrack along with guaranteed access to the game's beta!  Backers of this tier will be credited in the game as a "Kickstarter Backer!"  Includes all previous reward tiers (except Early Bird offer.)
Eternal Fate Four Pack!  Special tier that includes four digital download keys to share with your friends.  Includes Kickstarter Backer credit and all previous reward tiers.

Special Edition Game Disc! TWO digital download keys of Eternal Fate along with a packaged special edition game disc!  Also an original Eternal Fate poster (your choice from 4 options.)  Includes special thanks in the game credits and all previous reward tiers (excluding four pack)

Includes an original autographed Eternal Fate poster (your choice from 4 options, suitable for framing) along with a CD copy of the game soundtrack!  Includes special thanks in the game credits and all previous reward tiers (excluding four pack)

Premium Edition!  A premium boxed copy of the game disc + a limited edition vinyl record of the soundtrack + the official Eternal Fate Kickstarter Backer shirt.  Includes special thanks in the game credits and all previous reward tiers (excludes four pack)

Elite Edition. At this tier you will receive everything found in the previous tiers as well as an exclusive limited edition Art of Eternal Fate full color hardcover book + an Eternal Fate Team Member shirt!  Includes "Key supporter" recognition in the game credits. (excludes four pack)

Haste Edition! At this tier you will receive all previous tiers along with a pair of limited edition Eternal Fate Sneakers! (in your size of course!) Includes "Key supporter" recognition in the game credits. (excludes four pack)

Weapon Designer. At this tier you will receive ALL previous reward tiers as well as the ability to help design a new weapon in Eternal Fate. You will work closely with our design team to help create, name, and iterate on a new weapon for your favorite character class. Additionally, you will receive "Additional Designer" recognition in the credits.

Weapon & Armor Designer. At this tier you will receive ALL previous reward tiers as well as the ability to help design a set of weapons and armor in Eternal Fate. You will work closely with our design team to help create, name, and iterate on a new loadout for your favorite character class. Additionally, you will receive "Additional Designer" recognition in the credits.

Game Designer.  At this tier you will receive ALL previous reward tiers as well as the ability to help design one of the levels in Eternal Fate. You will work closely with our design team to help design the layout of an actual level for inclusion in the game. Additionally, you will receive "Additional Designer" recognition in the credits.
